publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2333# Tricia Marwick: Committee of the Regions-That the Parliament considers that the Scottish Executive should recommend to Her Majesty's Government that all of Scotland's representation on the Committee of the Regions should be elected councillors.
S1M-2333# Committee of the Regions (lodged on 18 October 2001) Fiona McLeod*

S1M-2333# Committee of the Regions (lodged on 18 October 2001) Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Kay Ullrich*, Brian Adam*, Andrew Wilson*, Colin Campbell*, Linda Fabiani*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Shona Robison*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Michael Russell*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
S1M-2333# Committee of the Regions (lodged on 18 October 2001) Ms Margo MacDonald*, Michael Matheson*, Irene McGugan*, Stewart Stevenson*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Bruce Crawford*
S1M-2333# Committee of the Regions (lodged on 18 October 2001) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2333# Committee of the Regions (lodged on 18 October 2001) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2333# Committee of the Regions (lodged on 18 October 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
